employeeID.title: employeeID
employeeID.description: ID for the employee who is making the PTO request

ptoDays.title: ptoDays
ptoDays.description: Number of PTO days being requested

ptoEndTime.title: ptoEndTime
ptoEndTime.description: End time for the PTO request. Required if asking for less than a day

ptoEntitled.title: ptoEntitled
ptoEntitled.description: Number of PTO days the employee is entitled to

ptoID.title: ptoID
ptoID.description: ID for the PTO request. Required only when updating a PTO request

ptoStartDate.title: ptoStartDate
ptoStartDate.description: Date for the first day of the PTO

ptoStartTime.title: ptoStartTime
ptoStartTime.description: Start time for the PTO request. Required if asking for less than a day
